name: Fishing Paradise
description:
Your love for fishing has awarded you an eternity in a fishing paradise. I've heard fish make for good company. Who knows? Maybe you'll make a friend.

CONTROLS:

  • (Menu) Point and trigger to select option
  • Trigger to teleport
  • Grip to grab harpoon or fish

[NOTE: this is a submission for the VR GAME JAM 2021 and its my first VR game published! hope you enjoy this solo project :) only tested on an HTC Vive, so that's probably the best experience to play the game ... also there may be one or two bugs]
